title: Super Galaxy Kindred bug [GAMEPLAY]
body: Ever since the Super Galaxy Kindred {{champion:203}} skin has been released, after getting a few stacks of her marks (over two, I noticed at five stacks) her auto attacks stop using the effects for the Super Galaxy skin, but rather they return to the Default Kindred's auto attacks. This affects me greatly because when I bought the skin I expect it to have its nice looking effects, not the default effects. It affects my gameplay because I get pissed at the skin not functioning properly, which distracts me.

replies.body:
Hey ZeroZephyrum - 

Thanks for the report! This should be fixed with the next patch! :)
